name: Morning Forest
promptSnippet: Inspired by the morning in the forest, colours of dark tree trunks blended with soft muted greens and pastels.

material1.description: Light warm-oak chevron floor with a matte finish. Soft natural wood grain, gentle colour variation, classic V-shaped pattern.

material3.description: Light taupe texture a subtle vertical ribbed texture

material4.description: Dark grey stone backsplash with a mixed mineral pattern: deep charcoal base, lighter grey veining, and scattered textured stone fragments.
